description: Hey everyone ðŸ‘‹. This is the homepage of everything that is 'me'. In the middle of all kind of chaos, I decided to make this site. That should give you some idea of who I am. Anyways, hope you have a wonderful day. Be thankful, work hard, party at night - that's my mantra.

items.title: Currently
items.desc: Preparing for IB Diploma Exams, N22

items.title: Podcast - It's so confusing
items.desc: I have been experimenting with the art of podcasting, as I created my very own show on Spotify. I try and explore current news, world affairs, and bring a bit of personal relevance. It's a relaxed, yet quick brief of the news. I wish to have a co-host, so if you're interested please let me know! Also, hope you enjoy the songs too!

items.title: Work at getCREDIBLE
items.desc: I intern at getCREDIBLE as an app developer, and am responsible for the key modules concerning machine learning. As part of my work, I actively promote them on social media. Check out their website and social media pages below ðŸ‘‡.
